titles.title: Remembering the 30th anniversary of the 1992 Los Angeles insurrection.
Remembering the 30th anniversary of the 1992 Los Angeles insurrection.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the importance of the 1992 Los Angeles Insurrection in bringing attention to racial inequities, including with respect to racial profiling and other unfair and discriminatory practices in the criminal justice system. It also offers condolences to those who lost lives and suffered injuries during the insurrection.
